verbose_text: Post hoc analysis of data from a 24-week study showed that 3.75 g/day colesevelam reduced LDL cholesterol (placebo corrected change from baseline : -13.2%; P < 0.001) and FPG (placebo corrected change from baseline : -4.0 mg/dL) in patients with hypercholesterolemia and prediabetes.
evidence: Post hoc analysis of data from a 24-week study showed that 3.75 g/day colesevelam reduced LDL cholesterol
